channel.title: Compile error
channel.description:
this is a little help for the new people that are trying to make servers... ;D to help undrestand it...
Purpose: Fixing the error
Difficulty: 1
Assumed Knowledge: editing compile.bat
Server Base: All
Classes Modified: compile.bat
Procedure Step 1: Open compile.bat with notepad and replace 'Javac' with this:
[code]"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\javac.exe"[/code] Change to '08' to whatever Java JDK version you've got. To check your JDK Version, go to C:\Program Files\Java and look at the number after jdk.1.5.0_.
[glow=red,2,300]hope this will work, im also trying to find out more topics about the runserver errors to post it here...[/glow] ;D if it doesnt work then use mod taharok code (this is the shorter one that i know that he post :P) [code]@echo off title TestScape Compiler "%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause[/code]
well thats all...

item.title: Compile error
item.dc:creator: @adamhack adamhack
item.description:
@adamhack wrote:

this is a little help for the new people that are trying to make servers… ;D
to help undrestand it…

Purpose: Fixing the error

Difficulty: 1

Assumed Knowledge: editing compile.bat

Server Base: All

Classes Modified: compile.bat

Procedure
Step 1: Open compile.bat with notepad and replace ‘Javac’ with this:

"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\javac.exe"

Change to ‘08’ to whatever Java JDK version you’ve got. To check your JDK Version, go to C:\Program Files\Java and look at the number after jdk.1.5.0_.

[glow=red,2,300]hope this will work, im also trying to find out more topics about the runserver errors to post it here…[/glow] ;D
if it doesnt work then use mod taharok code (this is the shorter one that i know that he post :P)

@echo off title TestScape Compiler "%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

well thats all…

Read full topic
